item.title: Backup your data with Hyper Backup on Synology NAS
item.description: Install the Hyper Backup package in your Synology NAS and configure it to back up your data on an external cloud service such as S3, Dropbox, etc.

item.title: Consolidate all your cloud storage data with Cloud Sync
item.description: It’s not uncommon to have our data stored on multiple sources on the cloud. We might have some data stored on Dropbox, others on Google Drive, and still others on iCloud Drive. With Synology’s Cloud Sync, they can finally all live in one place.

item.title: Setup a home media server with Video Station on Synology NAS
item.description: Setup a home media server with Synology’s Video Station. Download DS Video to watch your videos on Apple TV and iOS.
